name: Fun Run Racing-Animal Race& Free Running Games
name_original: Fun Run Racing-Animal Race& Free Running Games
description:
Welcome to the “Fun Run Racing” ! Run ! Run ! Run ! An awesome game for ALL AGES! Run for the forest kingdom ,collect coins and make highest score. If you want runner games or if you want animal games, this game is for you.
One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving game for animal racing ever made! And it's free!

Meet Super Pet, the animals racer. They are on a racing that will try hard to get the best title.
Face the challenges of unique hill climbing,rocks,stones environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances.

Features:
- Fun game play,cute animals
- 4 World maps with more than 60 Levels!
- Different animal skills
- Store system (new animals and power ups)
- You need collect coins and you need to buy other animals.
- Easy control just tap and tap
- Very interesting and funny badges - achievements
- Compatible with Tablet and Phones !
- Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles for animal racing- Upgradeable parts include weapons, speed, tools, suspension, tires and 4WD
- Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation
- Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets)
- Over 10 animals racer (Super Pig, Monkey…)
- Try over 6 types of weapons when racing in animal racing game
